data.name: Informative Numbers
data.description:
Observe this series:
```coffeescript
01,1011,111021...
```
In the first term, there is ONE ZERO (because 0 occurs one time) and ONE ONE (because 0 occurs one time), thus creating the next term: 1011.
This is also true in the case of the second term where there is ONE ONE, ONE ZERO and TWO ONEs (Ones are consecutive). So the third term is 111021 and so on.

The objective of this kata is to create a function ```infoNum(n)``` and continue the series for some given number ```n```.

Examples: 
```javascript
infoNum(11);
//returns 21
```
```javascript
infoNum(7322);
//returns 171322
```

NOTE: Input will be given as strings. Input will always be a positive integer.
